Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, 48th pl & into the terminal, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, California, 51st, Kedzie, 48th Place & into the terminal, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription:
Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity.

Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at California due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
